__e: Her friends told me that she ran away with her boyfriend.
I told him I'd run away with him, I wanted to live with him, because without him, life had no meaning.
What possible reason could I have? Well, he promised you his daughter, you took him at his word, and she ran off with another guy.
{\fsp-0.5}The beast escaped and killed four people. {\fsp-0.5}which means your friends have escaped.
He's the reason she went away. And he knows more about her than anyone alive.
We haven't seen you in so long, We thought you'd run off and found yourself a man.
Did he also happen to mention that my sister has escaped Federal custody, and is now back with the Family, as well?
SHE DOESN'T KNOW MOM ESCAPED FROM PRISON, OR WAS IN PRISON, FOR THAT MATTER.
I've never been running for my life before.
I later learned that they always suspected I'd escaped from another village as a result of some scandal, and then I started to feel much more like I'm used to.
Well, when I left here and went to take Josh home, they found me there. Or followed me there.
I stayed all night with her.
My big sister ran off with a normal guy, and I was left all alone.
So I told myself that one day I would flee the kingdom, and I would find real friends and my true love.
She ran away from her parents after they heard her talking to someone.
I... It felt good, someone caring enough to say no, but I just told her "Fuck off" and I stormed out.
This isn't about the bathroom. This is about you thinking you can move in and do whatever you want, even though you're only here because you threw a tantrum and ran away.
